message: YES YES YES !!!!

Hey we'll even be happy to help get you there One Way of course! Lol

Reminds me of my former boss who fired me because I got knee tendinitis at work and couldn't stand all day long! I was able to do my job, in fact better than before while sitting on a chair, but he said other workers can't see me sitting while they're standing!!!
